text: +1 I’ve grown to love Notion as well. It felt a bit confusing at first, but once we spent some time building the workspace, it’s become an essential tool. We use it for project management, kanban boards, content calendar, and taks lists. It’s also a great place to store and organize resources and collateral, so other teams across the company can find what they need.
